values.description: Backtesting is the process of simulating a trading algorithm on historical data. By running a backtest, you can measure how the algorithm would have performed.
values.keywords: institutional-grade datasets, open-source backtesting engine, local backtest, historical simulations
values.og:description: Backtesting is the process of simulating a trading algorithm on historical data. By running a backtest, you can measure how the algorithm would have performed.
values.og:title: Backtesting - Documentation QuantConnect.com
